item.title: Help trying to change pk points amount
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

runescape sucks is exactly correct.

Search for “pkPoints +=”

What the above statement does is add to your pk points, by whatever the number after the addition and equal sign.

Examples:
pkPoints += 3; (Gain of 3 pkPoints)
pkPoints -= 3; (Loss of 3 pkPoints)

I hope this will help you for future references.

Read full topic
item.source: Help trying to change pk points amount

item.title: Help trying to change pk points amount

item.description:

i think this is the code for changing the amount given?
characterfile.write("pkPoints = ", 0, 11);

would i just change 11? to how many per kill?
